title: SB Xero OCR Global Reader
description: Processes a single Xero attachment record (fileName, invoice IDs, base64 PDF) and runs OCR.

fileName.title: File name
fileName.description: Original file name of the attachment, e.g. _Son_2024-12-31_7287.50.pdf

xeroType.title: Xero type
xeroType.description: Optional Xero type (e.g. ACCPAY, ACCREC). May be null in some flows.

xeroYear.title: Xero year
xeroYear.description: Financial year label for the invoice/attachment, e.g. 2024.

lineItemId.title: Line item ID
lineItemId.description: Line item or composite ID for this attachment.

targetType.title: Target type
targetType.description: Classification of this attachment (e.g. ORPHAN_ATTACHMENT, ATTACHMENT, etc.).

fileContentBase64.title: File content (Base64 PDF)
fileContentBase64.description: Base64-encoded PDF content for this attachment.
